Summary Career 
- Eight years in software development as SCM, Build, Release Engineering, CI/CD Architect at Yahoo Inc. 
- Nine years in manufacturing (MFG) of high-speed routers and peripherals as MFG Test Automation Engineer at Juniper Networks.  
- Over two years in router software development as QA, Build, Release Engineer at Fore Systems. 
- Combined nine years in the medical field as Biotech Medical Engineer and Technician at InnerDyne Inc. and Target Therapeutics respectively. 
 
Qualifications 
- Able to define, implement, and oversee end-to-end build and release process with CI/CD pipelines for wide-ranging projects with complex requirements. Able to set up and manage modern CI/CD tools and services with service level agreements (SLAs). 
- Seasoned contributor in charge as resident Release Engineer and Automation Specialist for large business units. At Yahoo: Sponsored Search, Ads & Data CD, User Profiling & Platforms; Juniper Networks: Manufacturing & Operations. 
- Adept at solving problems, developing standard solutions, strategies, workflows, conventions, and configurations. Especially adept and passionate with automation using Perl, Ruby, Shells and Linux commands. 
- Avid practitioner and facilitator of practical concepts: Domain Driven Design (DDD), Agile, DevOps, Frameworks, Templates, OOD, Structured Analysis, Data Driven, DocScripts. 
- Ability to perform research, create experiments, and prototype solutions with structured analysis for thought leadership and decision-making on corporate mandates and CI/CD subject matters. 
- Hands-on experience with multitude of software development environments, tools, and technologies: Jenkins (Hudson), Git, Github, Gerrit, Subversion (SVN), CVS, Perl, Ruby, Chef, Make, Maven, Ant, YINST, Dist, RolesDB, RPM, Redhat, Ubuntu, FreeBSD, Windows, Mac, Jira, Jive, Bugzilla, MySQL, Apache, Drupal, RoR, HTML, YAML, JSON, Wiki, Google Docs, MS Office.
